text: This is Demo One with very noticeable background audio. You should clearly hear ambient sounds behind the speech.
This is Demo Two featuring city street ambiance. The background should be clearly audible but not overpowering.
This is Demo Three with coffee shop background sounds. Notice how the ambient audio enhances the listening experience.
This is Demo Four with rain ambiance. The background audio creates atmosphere while keeping speech clear.
This is Demo Five showcasing highway ambience. Each background track is randomly selected for variety.
